name: Switching Majors
description:
A game about switching majors, the slowest process ever...

Play through a series of minigames that emulate the monotonous task of changing your major.

These Include, but are not limited to:

  • Contemplate Life choices
  • Burn money
  • Write angry emails

Uh Oh, you have something better to do with your time?

  • See Family
  • Maintain Social Life
  • Go class

Can you switch your major in a reasonable amount of time? No probably not, but you can try! play now!
